Package com.piotrzawada.BarberShopBookingSystem.Controllers

Class BookingController

java.lang.Object
com.piotrzawada.BarberShopBookingSystem.Controllers.BookingController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/bookings") public class BookingController extends Object
Rest Controller for handles REST requests related to the Bookings.
Version:
1.2
Author:
Piotr Zawada

    • bookVisit

      @PutMapping("/book") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Response> bookVisit(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails userDetails, @RequestParam String localDateTime, @RequestParam String name)
      Book visit in a Barber
      Parameters:
      userDetails - - details of the user who make a booking
      localDateTime - - date and time of the appointment
      name - - name of the service example:Dry Hair Cut
      Returns:
      Response Entity with message and HttpStatus

    • cancelVisit

      @PutMapping("/cancel") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Response> cancelVisit(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails userDetails, @RequestParam String ldt)
      Cancel booking by user
      Parameters:
      userDetails - details of the user who want to cancel the booking
      ldt - date and time
      Returns:
      Response Entity with message and HttpStatus

    • myBookings

      @GetMapping("/myBookings") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> myBookings(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails userDetails)
      Display all existing and past customer bookings
      Parameters:
      userDetails - details of the user who want to see his/her bookings details
      Returns:
      Response Entity with map of user bookings and HttpStatus

    • getAvailableSlots

      @GetMapping("/availableTimes") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getAvailableSlots(@RequestParam String date)
      Display the time slots available to book by date
      Parameters:
      date - String value with date
      Returns:
      Response Entity (List of strings in hour format HH:mm, Http Status)
